code: import*as THREE from"three";export function generateGalaxy(){let numParticles=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:2500;const geometry=new THREE.BufferGeometry();const positions=new Float32Array(numParticles*3);const colors=new Float32Array(numParticles*3);const color=new THREE.Color();const arms=2;const armTwist=0.5;for(let i=0;i<numParticles;i++){const r=Math.random()**0.5;const angle=r*2*Math.PI*arms+Math.random()*armTwist;positions[i*3]=r*Math.cos(angle)*300;positions[i*3+1]=r*Math.sin(angle)*300;positions[i*3+2]=(Math.random()-0.5)*100;const c=0.6+Math.random()*0.4;color.setRGB(c,c,1);colors[i*3]=color.r;colors[i*3+1]=color.g;colors[i*3+2]=color.b;}geometry.setAttribute("position",new THREE.BufferAttribute(positions,3));geometry.setAttribute("color",new THREE.BufferAttribute(colors,3));const material=new THREE.PointsMaterial({size:2,vertexColors:true});return new THREE.Points(geometry,material);}
